solution_line_template: Her cash back app gave her {cashback_percent_num}% back on ${medicine_cost} so that's {cashback_percent_decimal}*{medicine_cost} = $<<{cashback_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{medicine_cost}={cashback_amount}>>{cashback_amount} cash back

She received ${cashback_amount} from the cashback app and has a ${rebate_amount} mail-in rebate for a total of {cashback_amount}+{rebate_amount} = $<<{cashback_amount}+{rebate_amount}={total_discounts}>>{total_discounts} discounts

She spent ${medicine_cost} for the medicine and has ${total_discounts} worth of discounts so the medicine will cost {medicine_cost}-{total_discounts} = $<<{medicine_cost}-{total_discounts}={final_cost}>>{final_cost}
